website_summaries.verdict: Toddlers won’t let go of this doll, and will love the “doctor” accessories, though adding another diaper to the bundle wouldn’t hurt.
pros: A stethoscope and medical accessories allow kids to give this doll her “well baby” checkups
Toddlers love the realistic movements and features
cons: Single diaper isn’t enough, necessitating pricey replacements
Some of the accessories look cheap

customer_reviews.title: Great doll!
customer_reviews.text: The doll is wonderfull just like the picture i purchased a doll for my little cousin and she loves it and it came earlyer than expected No marks or anything was on the doll and it came to the Bahamas with out a mark to be found just like the picture its a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bailey is awesome, we love her accessories
customer_reviews.text: Bailey is awesome, we love her accessories, cute little Dr kit and theme, love Bailey's outfit and heart in her hair, her dress is really good quality and fits the doll nice unlike her ice cream dolls where the dress is more like a shirt, Great doll hasbro
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old granddaughter picked this out herself for her birthday. It’s perfect for her little arms and the right size to take her baby with her. Great gift

customer_reviews.title: Lol
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for her birthday and she loved it... Unfortunately so did the dog so now I will have to re-purchase

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this doll. Even her boy cousin wants one now. Only thing is that I wish they sold cloth diapers. I am making some to fit. You can go through expensive diapers really fast even with trying to dry them.

customer_reviews.title: She will be super excited to get this one
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has on of these at her grandparents house and absolutely loves it! She will be super excited to get this one! She loves that this baby is as close to have a real baby as they come!

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: A Fun Doll
customer_reviews.text: Other than needing far more than one diaper for a granddaughter who wanted to "feed" her baby, the doll is adorable. She specifically asked for the doctor one because she is fascinated with the stethoscope and thermometer and was checking for illness often.

customer_reviews.title: Little but daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how small this doll is! I guess if you have seen them in stores you know what you are getting. My daughter loves it though. It wqas exactly what she wanted. I was hoping to use preemie baby diapers rather than doll diapers since the doll diapers are so expensive. the preemie diapers I bought were still way too big. They will work, but are huge.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made Toy - "Pees" Out of Its Neck
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saved up for weeks to buy this doll, only to find that water pours out of the back of the doll's neck when she "drinks" from the included cup. Fortunately Amazon made it easy to return - hoping the replacement is better quality.

customer_reviews.title: The doll is nice and my daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: The doll is nice and my daughter likes it. But the accessories are really cheap and useless. Biggest disappointment: these diapers are not reuseable. I guess they wanted you to have to buy more, just like a really alive baby. 👎🏻

customer_reviews.title: It was a great buy. My 3 year old grandaughter loves her
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this doll she was only around 15 dollars. It was a great buy. My 3 year old grandaughter loves her!! I went back to order another one for a friend and they had gone up to 28 dollars here on amazon. So, just watch the price. The doll is super cute though!!

product_meta.title: Baby Alive Better Now Bailey (Blonde)
product_meta.description: Oh no! Poor Better Now Bailey is home sick today, and she needs someone to take care of her. Give her a checkup to see what’s wrong. She comes with what is needed to take care of her, like a pretend thermometer and stethoscope. Feed her from her bottle- she drinks and wets! Then change her diaper. Taking care of Bailey when she’s sick isn’t always easy, but with a caring mom, she’ll bounce back in no time!
feature_bullets: Includes doll, outfit, diaper, instructions, and 4 accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars265 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
